synopsis:
There's an emergency drill at U.A. High School, and Class 1-A is requested to report for duty!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

After their fight with the Nomu, Hawks and Endeavor return to daily life, and Izuku dreams of One For All...

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Clash! Class A vs. Class B!

synopsis:
Class A and Class B are joined by a special guest as they battle it out during their joint combat training.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

The Class A team tries to put Shinso and his new equipment to good use in the first match against Class B.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's darkness versus darkness as Tokoyami and Kuroiro face off in the second match of the class battles!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Separated from her team, Yaoyorozu's leadership skills are put to the test in the second match of the class battles.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

In the third match of the class battles, Honenuki leads the Class B team against a well-balanced Class A team.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's still anybody's game as the third match continues with an endurance battle between Todoroki and Tetsutetsu.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Bakugo shows a different side of himself in the fourth team match as the class battles continue.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Midoriya and Shinso face off for the first time since the sports festival in the last fight of the class battles.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's an all-out brawl as the last two teams from Class A and Class B fight it out to the finish!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: The New Power and All For One

synopsis:
As the class battles conclude, Midoriya works with All Might and Bakugo on learning more about his new power.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

It's Christmas at U.A. and the Class 1-A students celebrate with a Christmas party.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Hawks acts strange when he meets Endeavor and his work study students on their way to Endeavor Agency.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

As the villains continue to move behind the scenes, Endeavor helps his work-study students with the next steps in their training.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Ryukyu brings her work study students with her when Selkie asks her to team up with him.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Endeavor brings his work study students over for dinner at Fuyumi's request but faces awkward conversations at home.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

One of Endeavor's biggest fans shows up to settle some unfinished business, and he expects far more than an autograph.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: More of a Hero Than Anyone

synopsis:
When an unsettling discovery is made regarding Kurogiri, Aizawa and Present Mic are summoned to interrogate him.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

A series of surprise encounters helps give Shigaraki a new sense of direction for the League of Villains.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

The League of Villains waits for Gigantomachia to wake up as they clash with the Meta Liberation Army.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

As Twice tries to save Toga, he thinks back on his past and makes a realization that helps him overcome it.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Memories from Shigaraki's past as Tenko Shimura resurface as he confronts Re-Destro.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Shigaraki remembers his first encounter with All For One during the climax of his battle with Re-Destro.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Both sides prepare for the confrontation between the heroes and the Paranormal Liberation Front as Class 1-A finishes their first year of high school.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
